title: Science Education Design Competency Enhancement Program Based on Self-Assessment of Instructional Design Capabilities

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Science education design competency development program for adults aged 40+ in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can self-assess their science education design capabilities on a 5-level scale based on the IBSTPI® Instructional Design Competency Framework.
Learners can establish improvement action plans with over 80% implementation in the 'Learning Analysis' and 'Media Utilization' domains of instructional design competencies through peer feedback.
Learners can apply at least three instructional design principles when designing science education projects using smartphone-based digital tools.

resources: Instructional Design Competency Assessment Questionnaire (5-Point Scale)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
